name: NU_COVID_19TestsForSARS_CoV_2SpikeProteinRBDAntibody
title: NU_COVID_19 (Tests for SARS_CoV_2 Spike Protein RBD Antibody)
description: This value set contains some provisional codes created for the COVID-19 response. It may be incomplete, as not all provisional COVID-19 codes are available in VSAC at the time of publication. Please contact the CSTE RCKMS Content Team for a complete list of codes to be included in this value set.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab test names that may be ordered or ‘observed’ for detection of SARS-CoV-2 Spike Protein RBD antibody in a clinical specimen by any method),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: SARS_CoV_2 spike protein RBD Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
